title: Pls fix this
body: So I was in a game and just having some fun, and then the server crashed and i spent five minutes trying to get back in. after about 15 min, i was able to recconect and i was ale to play again. when i finished the game, i was put in lower priority que for 5 games which doesnt make sense

replies.body: No doubt your peers appreciate you returning to the game, and I'm glad you were able to get back in the fight.  Leaverbuster treats all leaves equally for all players, though, even if it's not intentional.  This is because leaves causes others a negative experience, even if it's for a short duration.  More information on how the system works can also be found at the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).
